name: Qt Virtual machine manager
tagline: qt virtual machine manager libvirt spice lxc kvm qemu xen openvz vbox vmware
body:
![qt-virt-manager icon](https://f1ash.fedorapeople.org/Pictures/virtual-engineering.png)
qt-virt-manager
=================

***

![Qt Logo](http://d3hp9ud7yvwzy0.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/oneqt/images/favicon.ico.gzip)

The Qt GUI application for managing virtual machines.

![Made with libvirt](http://libvirt.org/madeWith.png)

Uses [libvirt](http://libvirt.org/index.html) as the back-end management API.

![SPICE logo](http://www.spice-space.org/images/favicon.png)

Uses [Spice client viewer](http://www.spice-space.org) for graphic consoles
to guest domains.



***

![Fedora logo](https://getfedora.org/static/images/fedora-logotext.png)

Development occurs based on the package database of [Fedora](https://fedoraproject.org).

Application is present as package

 * in repo: `dnf install virt-manager-qt5`

 * in [Fedora Copr](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/f1ash/QtVirtManager/):
 `dnf install qt4-virt-manager` or  `dnf install qt5-virt-manager`

 * in [FedoraPeople](https://f1ash.fedorapeople.org/qt-virt-manager/)

***

Does not contain platform-specific components.

***
